ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 120
ygData.msgSnippet: bah ,,,  I m back to wearing a rawhide tunic now because I was pk ed by a DE wiz last night in HHP ,,, funny how they wait until 4 orcs are beating up on me
ygData.messageBody:
bah ,,, I'm back to wearing a rawhide tunic now because I was pk'ed by a DE
wiz last night in HHP ,,, funny how they wait until 4 orcs are beating up on
me ,,,,

I am thinking about going back to full leather instead of banded ,, I'll
just keep my armor in the bank until I need it again .....

the weight is killing me,, I only have a str of 80

Nokker <Mysterian Knights>
Lvl 19 Half Elven Bard

p.s. if you are wondering how I got p.k.ed ,, it's because I am crazy
enough to play on the pvp server. NO,,, I'm not a pk ,, I belong to an
anti-PK guild ,,, I ,, along with most of the other people that play on
Rallos Zek ,, believe that it is the true RP server ,,, what is the point
of dark and light races without a race war??????? and the ability to kill
each other ,,

when you start out on the pvp server ,, it's pretty rough ,, I was killed
about 20 times before I made lvl 3 and left the newbie zone ,,,, but ,, it
gets better ,,, you still get PK'ed ,,, but it adds a little realism to the
game..
----- Original Message -----
From: Jason Rochelle <jasroc@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, June 21, 1999 7:18 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Digest Number 120


> From: Jason Rochelle <jasroc@...>
>
> Part of that is because some bards (namely ones
> that don't read this list *smile*) don't give our class a very good
> showing. They may not twist songs, or use their songs effectively. They
> also may not have good weapons or have weak armor (examples would be a
> L20 bard still wearing patchwork leather with some banded).
>
> Good example My level 9th Bard (with no twinking) is currently wearing 3
> pieces of banded. a level 20 in PW is ridiculous.
>

> ONElist members are using Shared Files in great ways!
